text: Got to Be There is the debut solo studio album by the American singer Michael Jackson. It was released in 1971. It has sold over 3.2 million copies around the world. Four singles were released from the album. It includes the hits "Got to Be There" and "Rockin' Robin" (originally sung by Bobby Day). == Track listing == ==References== Category:Michael Jackson albums Category:1972 albums Category:Debut albums Category:Pop albums Category:Soul albums Category:R&B; albums
title: Got to Be There
